meanings.definition: The act of playing the position of quarterback in football.
meanings.sent1: During the game, his quarterbacking was exceptional, leading the team to victory.
meanings.sent2: She showed great skill in quarterbacking the team to the championship.
meanings.sent3: The quarterbacking skills of the young player impressed everyone on the field.
meanings.sent4: Her natural talent for quarterbacking shone brightly under the stadium lights.
meanings.sent5: The coach praised his quarterbacking as the best he had seen in years.

meanings.definition: To lead or direct a team or group in a strategic manner, as a quarterback does in football.
meanings.sent1: He enjoys quarterbacking the project, making sure every detail is in place.
meanings.sent2: She is quarterbacking the sales team to achieve their quarterly targets.
meanings.sent3: His friends joked that he was quarterbacking the group project like a pro.
meanings.sent4: She was quarterbacking the meeting with precision, ensuring all voices were heard.
meanings.sent5: The CEO trusted him to quarterback the company's expansion plans with expertise.
